relation: Poo using his "Mirror" ability to transform into a mook. I don't know about you, but I never much used Poo's "Mirror". I drew this one mostly because I think it's a shame that more people haven't depicted his "Mirroring" in action.
This had been sitting on my harddrive unfinished for a good while, and with Halloween approaching, I figured it was time to finish it up. Based on the "mummy"-looking sprite from map screens.
I pity da fool who don't bring me my contact lense!
